    public static interface IPlayer.Listener
extends IPlayerBase.Listener

      • onPositionUnitProgress

        void onPositionUnitProgress(long position,
                            int posUnitIndex,
                            int posUnitState)
        WARNING: use position|posUnitIndex in C.STATE_PROGRESS_POS_UNIT_FINISH, remember to do the judgment(position>=0) | (posUnitIndex>=0)
        Parameters:
        position - current play position
        posUnitIndex - current position unit index
        posUnitState -
        • C.STATE_PROGRESS_POS_UNIT_START
        • C.STATE_PROGRESS_POS_UNIT_MID
        • C.STATE_PROGRESS_POS_UNIT_END
        • C.STATE_PROGRESS_POS_UNIT_FINISH
          See Also:
          IPlayer.setUpdatePlayProgressDelayMs(long)

        • onABProgress

          void onABProgress(long position,
                  long duration,
                  int abState)
          WARNING: use position,duration in C.STATE_PROGRESS_AB_FINISH, remember to do the judgment(position>=0 && duration>position)
          Parameters:
          position - current play ab position (position - abStartPosition)
          duration - ab duration (abEndPosition - abStartPosition)
          abState -
          • C.STATE_PROGRESS_AB_START
          • C.STATE_PROGRESS_AB_MID
          • C.STATE_PROGRESS_AB_END
          • C.STATE_PROGRESS_AB_FINISH
            See Also:
            IPlayer.setUpdatePlayProgressDelayMs(long)

          • onNotificationRequired

            void onNotificationRequired(int order)
            Notification request(by PlayerService and Notifier maintain)

            If you have a custom condition to control whether or not the request notification -> override

             @Override
 public void onNotificationRequired(int order) {
    if (request conditions) {
      super.onNotificationRequired(order);
    } else {
      super.onNotificationRequired(0);
    }
 }
            Parameters:
            order -
            • 0: stopNotification
            • 1: startNotification
            • 2: updateNotification
